DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Brushes - #6 Round Sable
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo #6 Round Sable Face Painting Brush #BRUS6 is 0.15 inches wide and serves as a good medium brush for face painting. Snazaroo Sable Brushes have nickel plated ferrules, a 7. 5 in white handle with a red tip, and are made from European 100% Kolinsky pure sable. Sable brushes hold more face paint than synthetic brushes so offer a longer continuous brush stroke saving time on reloading face paint. The Snazaroo #6 Round Sable Brush is one of Snazaroo's most popular brushes and ideal for outlining and face painting around the eyes.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red round sable face painting brush
Made from 100% Kolinsky pure sable bristles, nickel plated ferrule, with a white handle and red tip
